# Mantine UI - LLM Documentation

This index lists Mantine documentation pages formatted for LLMs.
Each link points to a standalone Markdown file under the /llms path.

For a single consolidated file with all content, use:
- https://mantine.dev/llms-full.txt

## Core

- [Accordion](./core-accordion.md): Divide content into collapsible sections
- [ActionIcon](./core-action-icon.md): Icon button
- [Affix](./core-affix.md): Renders children inside portal at fixed position
- [Alert](./core-alert.md): Attract user attention with important static message
- [Anchor](./core-anchor.md): Display link with theme styles
- [AngleSlider](./core-angle-slider.md): Pick angle value between 0 and 360
- [AppShell](./core-app-shell.md): Responsive shell for your application with header, navbar, aside and footer
- [AspectRatio](./core-aspect-ratio.md): Maintain responsive consistent width/height ratio
- [Autocomplete](./core-autocomplete.md): Autocomplete user input with any list of options
- [Avatar](./core-avatar.md): Display user profile image, initials or fallback icon
- [BackgroundImage](./core-background-image.md): Displays image as background
- [Badge](./core-badge.md): Display badge, pill or tag
- [Blockquote](./core-blockquote.md): Blockquote with optional cite
- [Box](./core-box.md): Base component for all Mantine components
- [Breadcrumbs](./core-breadcrumbs.md): Separates list of react nodes with given separator
- [Burger](./core-burger.md): Open/close navigation button
- [Button](./core-button.md): Button component to render button or link
- [Card](./core-card.md): Card with sections
- [Center](./core-center.md): Centers content vertically and horizontally
- [Checkbox](./core-checkbox.md): Capture boolean input from user
- [Chip](./core-chip.md): Pick one or multiple values with inline controls
- [CloseButton](./core-close-button.md): Button with close icon
- [Code](./core-code.md): Inline and block code
- [Collapse](./core-collapse.md): Animate presence with slide down/up transition
- [ColorInput](./core-color-input.md): Capture color from user
- [ColorPicker](./core-color-picker.md): Pick colors in hex(a), rgb(a), hsl(a) and hsv(a) formats
- [ColorSwatch](./core-color-swatch.md): Displays color
- [Combobox](./core-combobox.md): Create custom select, autocomplete or multiselect inputs
- [Container](./core-container.md): Center content with padding and max-width
- [CopyButton](./core-copy-button.md): Copies given text to clipboard
- [CorePackage](./core-package.md)
- [Dialog](./core-dialog.md): Display a fixed overlay dialog at any side of the screen
- [Divider](./core-divider.md): Horizontal line with optional label or vertical divider
- [Drawer](./core-drawer.md): Display overlay area at any side of the screen
- [Fieldset](./core-fieldset.md): Group related elements in a form
- [FileButton](./core-file-button.md): Open file picker with a button click
- [FileInput](./core-file-input.md): Capture files from user
- [Flex](./core-flex.md): Compose elements in a flex container
- [FloatingIndicator](./core-floating-indicator.md): Display a floating indicator over a group of elements
- [FocusTrap](./core-focus-trap.md): Trap focus at child node
- [Grid](./core-grid.md): Responsive 12 columns grid system
- [Group](./core-group.md): Compose elements and components in a horizontal flex container
- [Highlight](./core-highlight.md): Highlight given part of a string with mark
- [HoverCard](./core-hover-card.md): Display popover section when target element is hovered
- [Image](./core-image.md): Image with optional fallback
- [Indicator](./core-indicator.md): Display element at the corner of another element
- [Input](./core-input.md): Base component to create custom inputs
- [JsonInput](./core-json-input.md): Capture json data from user
- [Kbd](./core-kbd.md): Display keyboard key
- [List](./core-list.md): Display ordered or unordered list
- [Loader](./core-loader.md): Indicate loading state
- [LoadingOverlay](./core-loading-overlay.md): An overlay with centered loader
- [Mark](./core-mark.md): Highlight part of the text
- [Menu](./core-menu.md): Combine a list of secondary actions into single interactive area
- [Modal](./core-modal.md): An accessible overlay dialog
- [MultiSelect](./core-multi-select.md): Custom searchable multi select
- [NativeSelect](./core-native-select.md): Native select element based on Input
- [NavLink](./core-nav-link.md): Navigation link
- [Notification](./core-notification.md): Show dynamic notifications and alerts to user, part of notifications system
- [NumberFormatter](./core-number-formatter.md): Format number with thousands/decimal separators and suffix/prefix
- [NumberInput](./core-number-input.md): Capture number from user
- [Overlay](./core-overlay.md): Overlays parent element with div element with any color and opacity
- [Pagination](./core-pagination.md): Display active page and navigate between multiple pages
- [Paper](./core-paper.md): Renders white or dark background depending on color scheme
- [PasswordInput](./core-password-input.md): Capture password data from user
- [Pill](./core-pill.md): Removable and non-removable tags
- [PillsInput](./core-pills-input.md): Base component for custom tags inputs and multi selects
- [PinInput](./core-pin-input.md): Capture pin code or one time password from the user
- [Popover](./core-popover.md): Display popover section relative to given target element
- [Portal](./core-portal.md): Renders component outside of parent element tree
- [Progress](./core-progress.md): Give user feedback for status of the task
- [Radio](./core-radio.md): Wrapper for input type radio
- [RangeSlider](./core-range-slider.md): RangeSlider component
- [Rating](./core-rating.md): Pick and display rating
- [RingProgress](./core-ring-progress.md): Give user feedback for status of the task with circle diagram
- [ScrollArea](./core-scroll-area.md): Area with custom scrollbars
- [SegmentedControl](./core-segmented-control.md): A linear set of two or more segments
- [Select](./core-select.md): Custom searchable select
- [SemiCircleProgress](./core-semi-circle-progress.md): Represent progress with semi circle diagram
- [SimpleGrid](./core-simple-grid.md): Responsive grid in which each item takes equal amount of space
- [Skeleton](./core-skeleton.md): Indicate content loading state
- [Slider](./core-slider.md): Slider component
- [Space](./core-space.md): Add horizontal or vertical spacing from theme
- [Spoiler](./core-spoiler.md): Hide long sections of content under a spoiler
- [Stack](./core-stack.md): Compose elements and components in a vertical flex container
- [Stepper](./core-stepper.md): Display content divided into a steps sequence
- [Switch](./core-switch.md): Capture boolean input from user
- [Table](./core-table.md): Render table with theme styles
- [TableOfContents](./core-table-of-contents.md): Renders a list of headings on the page and tracks current heading visible in the viewport
- [Tabs](./core-tabs.md): Switch between different views
- [TagsInput](./core-tags-input.md): Capture a list of values from user with free input and suggestions
- [Text](./core-text.md): Display text
- [Textarea](./core-textarea.md): Autosize or regular textarea
- [TextInput](./core-text-input.md): Capture string input from user
- [ThemeIcon](./core-theme-icon.md): Render icon inside element with theme colors
- [Timeline](./core-timeline.md): Display list of events in chronological order
- [Title](./core-title.md): h1-h6 heading
- [Tooltip](./core-tooltip.md): Renders tooltip at given element on mouse over or other event
- [Transition](./core-transition.md): Animate presence of component with pre-made animations
- [Tree](./core-tree.md): Display a Tree structure
- [Typography](./core-typography.md): Styles provider for html content
- [UnstyledButton](./core-unstyled-button.md): Unstyled polymorphic button
- [VisuallyHidden](./core-visually-hidden.md): Hide element visually but keep it accessible for screen readers

## Hooks

- [HooksPackage](./hooks-package.md)
- [use-element-size](./hooks-use-element-size.md): Returns element width and height and observes changes with ResizeObserver
- [useClickOutside](./hooks-use-click-outside.md)
- [useClipboard](./hooks-use-clipboard.md)
- [useColorScheme](./hooks-use-color-scheme.md)
- [useCounter](./hooks-use-counter.md)
- [useDebouncedCallback](./hooks-use-debounced-callback.md)
- [useDebouncedState](./hooks-use-debounced-state.md)
- [useDebouncedValue](./hooks-use-debounced-value.md)
- [useDidUpdate](./hooks-use-did-update.md)
- [useDisclosure](./hooks-use-disclosure.md)
- [useDocumentTitle](./hooks-use-document-title.md)
- [useDocumentVisibility](./hooks-use-document-visibility.md)
- [useEventListener](./hooks-use-event-listener.md)
- [useEyeDropper](./hooks-use-eye-dropper.md)
- [useFavicon](./hooks-use-favicon.md)
- [useFetch](./hooks-use-fetch.md)
- [useFileDialog](./hooks-use-file-dialog.md)
- [useFocusReturn](./hooks-use-focus-return.md)
- [useFocusTrap](./hooks-use-focus-trap.md)
- [useFocusWithin](./hooks-use-focus-within.md)
- [useForceUpdate](./hooks-use-force-update.md)
- [useFullscreen](./hooks-use-fullscreen.md)
- [useHash](./hooks-use-hash.md)
- [useHeadroom](./hooks-use-headroom.md)
- [useHotkeys](./hooks-use-hotkeys.md)
- [useHover](./hooks-use-hover.md)
- [useId](./hooks-use-id.md)
- [useIdle](./hooks-use-idle.md)
- [useInputState](./hooks-use-input-state.md)
- [useIntersection](./hooks-use-intersection.md)
- [useInterval](./hooks-use-interval.md)
- [useInViewport](./hooks-use-in-viewport.md)
- [useIsFirstRender](./hooks-use-is-first-render.md)
- [useIsomorphicEffect](./hooks-use-isomorphic-effect.md)
- [useListState](./hooks-use-list-state.md)
- [useLocalStorage](./hooks-use-local-storage.md)
- [useLogger](./hooks-use-logger.md)
- [useLongPress](./hooks-use-long-press.md)
- [useMap](./hooks-use-map.md)
- [useMediaQuery](./hooks-use-media-query.md)
- [useMergedRef](./hooks-use-merged-ref.md)
- [useMounted](./hooks-use-mounted.md)
- [useMouse](./hooks-use-mouse.md)
- [useMove](./hooks-use-move.md)
- [useMutationObserver](./hooks-use-mutation-observer.md)
- [useNetwork](./hooks-use-network.md)
- [useOrientation](./hooks-use-orientation.md)
- [useOs](./hooks-use-os.md)
- [usePageLeave](./hooks-use-page-leave.md)
- [usePagination](./hooks-use-pagination.md)
- [usePrevious](./hooks-use-previous.md)
- [useQueue](./hooks-use-queue.md)
- [useRadialMove](./hooks-use-radial-move.md)
- [useReducedMotion](./hooks-use-reduced-motion.md)
- [useResizeObserver](./hooks-use-resize-observer.md)
- [useScrollIntoView](./hooks-use-scroll-into-view.md)
- [useScrollSpy](./hooks-use-scroll-spy.md)
- [useSelection](./hooks-use-selection.md)
- [useSet](./hooks-use-set.md)
- [useSetState](./hooks-use-set-state.md)
- [useShallowEffect](./hooks-use-shallow-effect.md)
- [useStateHistory](./hooks-use-state-history.md)
- [useTextSelection](./hooks-use-text-selection.md)
- [useThrottledCallback](./hooks-use-throttled-callback.md)
- [useThrottledState](./hooks-use-throttled-state.md)
- [useThrottledValue](./hooks-use-throttled-value.md)
- [useTimeout](./hooks-use-timeout.md)
- [useToggle](./hooks-use-toggle.md)
- [useUncontrolled](./hooks-use-uncontrolled.md)
- [useValidatedState](./hooks-use-validated-state.md)
- [useViewportSize](./hooks-use-viewport-size.md)
- [useWindowEvent](./hooks-use-window-event.md)
- [useWindowScroll](./hooks-use-window-scroll.md)

## Dates

- [Calendar](./dates-calendar.md): Base component for custom date pickers
- [DateInput](./dates-date-input.md): Free form date input
- [DatePicker](./dates-date-picker.md): Inline date, multiple dates and dates range picker
- [DatePickerInput](./dates-date-picker-input.md): Date, multiple dates and dates range picker input
- [DateTimePicker](./dates-date-time-picker.md): Capture datetime from the user
- [GettingStartedDates](./dates-getting-started.md)
- [MiniCalendar](./dates-mini-calendar.md): Compact calendar to display a small number of days in a row
- [MonthPicker](./dates-month-picker.md): Inline month, multiple months and months range picker
- [MonthPickerInput](./dates-month-picker-input.md): Month, multiple months and months range picker input
- [TimeGrid](./dates-time-grid.md): Captures time value from the user with a predefined set of options
- [TimeInput](./dates-time-input.md): Capture time from the user
- [TimePicker](./dates-time-picker.md): Captures time value from the user
- [TimeValue](./dates-time-value.md): Display a formatted time value
- [YearPicker](./dates-year-picker.md): Inline year, multiple years and years range picker
- [YearPickerInput](./dates-year-picker-input.md): Inline year, multiple years and years range picker

## Charts

- [AreaChart](./charts-area-chart.md): Area chart component with stacked, percent and split variants
- [BarChart](./charts-bar-chart.md): Bar chart component with stacked and percent variants
- [BubbleChart](./charts-bubble-chart.md): Bubble chart component
- [CompositeChart](./charts-composite-chart.md): Composed chart with support for Area, Bar and Line charts
- [DonutChart](./charts-donut-chart.md): Donut chart component
- [FunnelChart](./charts-funnel-chart.md): Funnel chart component
- [GettingStartedCharts](./charts-getting-started.md)
- [Heatmap](./charts-heatmap.md): Heatmap chart component
- [LineChart](./charts-line-chart.md): Line chart component
- [PieChart](./charts-pie-chart.md): Pie chart component
- [RadarChart](./charts-radar-chart.md): Radar chart component
- [RadialBarChart](./charts-radial-bar-chart.md): Radial bar chart component
- [ScatterChart](./charts-scatter-chart.md): Scatter chart component
- [Sparkline](./charts-sparkline.md): Simplified area chart to show trends

## X

- [Carousel](./x-carousel.md): Embla based carousel component
- [CodeHighlight](./x-code-highlight.md): Highlight code with shiki or highlight.js
- [Dropzone](./x-dropzone.md): Capture files from user with drag and drop
- [ExtensionsPackage](./x-extensions.md)
- [Modals manager](./x-modals.md): Centralized modals manager with option to handle state of multi-step modals
- [NavigationProgress](./x-nprogress.md): Navigation progress bar
- [Notifications system](./x-notifications.md): Mantine notifications system
- [Rich text editor](./x-tiptap.md): Tiptap based rich text editor
- [Spotlight](./x-spotlight.md): Command center for your application
